DOC.brief_summary: The purpose research study compare different method train hand movement home stroke . This study involve research test two experimental device , MusicGlove Resonating Arm Exerciser ( RAE ) , compare conventional hand arm exercise . The MusicGlove glove measure finger movement allow user play musical computer game use movement . The RAE lever attache manual wheelchair elastic band push back forth exercise arm .
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose research study compare different method train hand movement home stroke . This study involve research test two experimental device , MusicGlove Resonating Arm Exerciser ( RAE ) , compare conventional hand arm exercise . The MusicGlove glove measure finger movement allow user play musical computer game use movement . The RAE lever attache manual wheelchair elastic band push back forth exercise arm .
DOC.criteria: Age 18 80 year age Sustained single stroke affect arm , least three month prior enrollment Minimal moderate lose motor control arm stroke No active major psychiatric problem , neurological/orthopedic problem affect strokeaffected upper extremity No active major neurological disease stroke Absence pain strokeaffected upper extremity Severe tone affect upper extremity Severe aphasia Severe reduce level consciousness Severe sensory/proprioception deficit affect upper extremity Currently pregnant Difficulty understand comply instruction Inability perform experimental task study Increased pain movement strokeaffected upper extremity
